segments.text: My name is Liu Lichi . How do you do ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How do you do ? Please be seated , How is your trip here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Quite good , I think . I came here by bus , and it took me about 15 minutes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I'm student of grade 3 in the university majoring in economics .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: English , math , commercial and legal studies , and accountancy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you had any working experience .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I worked at a supermarket during last summer holidays .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you like to do in your spare time ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like sports very much.Besides that , I also like working on a computer in my spare time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How are your English and computer skills ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have passed the CET - 4 and 6.As far as computer is concerned I can use the computer for word processing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay . Mr.Liu , we'll inform you of the results within a week .
segments.speaker: S1
